jd: From: Praveen Kumar, Magicforce praveen@magicforce.us Reply to: praveen@magicforce.us Job Title: Healthcare Python Data Engineer Location: Remote Duration: 1+ Year Job Description: As an Lead Python Data Engineer, you will be a part of an Agile team to build healthcare applications and implement new features while adhering to the best coding development standards Mandatory skills; Python, Shell Scripting, Linux, FHIR, EDI, InterOp •7-9 years strong programming skills in Python, SQL and Shell Scripting with experience in frameworks like Django/Flask. •Expertise with shell scripting in Linux environment •Significant experience with data ingestions, ETL process, database architecture and a solid understanding of data processing using Python. •Ability to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system •Knowledge of User Authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers and environments •Solid understanding of relational databases and SQL •RESTful API design and integrations, proficiency in working with APIs and integrating different systems. •Automation and continuous integration •Working knowledge of technologies such as HTML, CSS and JavaScript •Git or other version control tools •Agile environment and testing frameworks (eg. unittest/pytest) Educational Qualifications: -•Engineering Degree – BE/ME/BTech/MTech/BSc/MSc.•Technical certification in multiple technologies is desirable. Please fill the skill matrix and revert back me SKILL YEARS OF EXPERIENCE SELF RATING OUT OF 5 FHIR Python EDI Shell Scripting
